contents.text: Thank you for calling PayPal South Bay, the faster, safer way to send money, make payments, and manage your account.
For assistance with personal accounts, press 1.
To send or request money, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in sending and requesting money. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I need to send a reimbursement request to a colleague for shared expenses.
I need to send money to my landlord for rent.
I need to send a $150 instant P2P transfer to a friend in Europe and lock in the current exchange rate.
I need help sending money to my granddaughter using my personal PayPal account.
I need to request reimbursement from my lab partner for shared equipment costs.

contents.text: For account security and support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a security specialist. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I want to enable two-factor authentication on my account to secure it immediately.
I suspect someone accessed my account without permission; I need help securing it.
I want to set up FIDO2 hardware security keys for my PayPal account to enforce MFA.
I forgot my password and need help updating my account’s security settings.
I want to enable two-factor authentication on my PayPal account.

contents.text: For merchant services and business solutions, press 2.
To set up or manage your merchant account, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a merchant account advisor. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Help me set up a PayPal business account for my consulting firm.
I am starting a veteran-owned small business and want to set up a PayPal merchant account.
I'd like to upgrade my business account to PayPal Pro, enable advanced merchant features, and adjust my transaction limits.
I want to set up a merchant account for my home crafts business.
I’d like to open a merchant account to sell my custom physics lab kits online.

contents.text: For payment integration and developer support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our integration support team. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Assist me in integrating the PayPal checkout API into my website.
I need assistance integrating PayPal payments into my new business website.
I need to obtain OAuth client credentials for the v2 Orders API and configure webhooks in my sandbox environment.
I need assistance connecting PayPal to my website for payment integration.
I need assistance integrating PayPal payments into my physics simulation app.
